details.description: Use the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency's (VOSA's) publications search to check vehicle operator licensing details
details.more_information:
You can use this service to check details for:

  • heavy goods vehicle (HGV) operator’s licence applications
  • public service vehicle (PSV) operator’s licence applications

If you need help, contact the VOSA helpline.

VOSA helpline
0300 123 9000
details.introduction: You can use the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency’s (VOSA’s) publications search to check vehicle operator licensing details.

details.description: Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

related.title: Manage your commercial vehicle operator licence online
